explanation: Funds are required for the procurement of Infantry Squad Vehicles as the current Army replacement for High Mobility Multipurpose Wheeled Vehicles identified and notified to Congress through this reprogramming action for provision to the Government of Ukraine in support of the international effort _ | to counter Russian aggression. This is a congressional special interest item. This is an emergency budget | requirement. |
